price: 52. Arrintaasna waa inuu ogaado inaanan ku khiyaanin maqnaashihii iyo inuusan Alle toosinin dhagarta khaa’iniinta.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika liyaʿlama annī lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī kayda al-khāinīna
